name: deterministic-32
description: Deterministic 32-way categorizer (stable hashing, normalization, overrides, labels) for TypeScript/JS.

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const path=require('node:path');const dist=path.resolve('dist');const src=path.join(dist,'src');for (const entry of fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true})){if(entry.isFile()&&(/\.(js|d.ts)$/.test(entry.name))){fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,entry.name),path.join(dist,entry.name));}}"
